languages.text: "Все верно. Ты весьма заботливо избавил{mf|ся|ась} от нее прежде, чем ее хрупкое сердечко разбили мои слова".
"No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."
languages.original_text: "Все верно. Ты весьма заботливо избавил{mf|ся|ась} от нее прежде, чем ее хрупкое сердечко разбили мои слова".

traits.locale_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No, no lo hará. Fuiste lo suficientemente amable como para librarte de ella antes de que mis palabras rompieran su frágil corazón».
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: «No, no lo hará. Fuiste lo suficientemente amable como para librarte de ella antes de que mis palabras rompieran su frágil corazón».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，她不会难过了。还没等我的话语击碎她那颗脆弱的小小心脏，你就已经仁慈地把她解决掉了。”
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，她不会难过了。还没等我的话语击碎她那颗脆弱的小小心脏，你就已经仁慈地把她解决掉了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「いや。俺の言葉があいつの壊れやすい小さな心を打ち砕く前に、お前が親切なことにあいつを追い出してくれたってことさ」
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: 「いや。俺の言葉があいつの壊れやすい小さな心を打ち砕く前に、お前が親切なことにあいつを追い出してくれたってことさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Aucun risque de ce côté-là, attendu que vous avez eu la bonté de lui régler son compte avant que ma révélation ne brise son petit cœur fragile. »
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: « Aucun risque de ce côté-là, attendu que vous avez eu la bonté de lui régler son compte avant que ma révélation ne brise son petit cœur fragile. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Ihr wart so gütig, mich von ihr zu befreien, bevor meine Worte ihr fragiles kleines Herz zertrümmern konnten."
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ihr wart so gütig, mich von ihr zu befreien, bevor meine Worte ihr fragiles kleines Herz zertrümmern konnten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

languages.text: "Üzülmeyecek. Ben sözlerimle o narin kalbini parçalayamadan icabına bakmışsın. Eksik olma."
languages.original_text: "No, she will not. You were kind enough to get rid of her before my words shattered her fragile little heart."

traits.locale_text: "Üzülmeyecek. Ben sözlerimle o narin kalbini parçalayamadan icabına bakmışsın. Eksik olma."
